Package gw.document

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextObject  
    DocTreeNode
    This class will permit creating a tree out of a series of documents.
    DocumentContentsInfo  
    DocumentContentsInfo.ContentResponseType  
    DocumentCreationInfo
    Encapsulates information about a Document entity currently being created in the UI.

    Document creation is a potentially complex process. Depending on the process being followed for a particular document, it could involve tracking a file uploaded by the user, new document contents created from a document template, or only some metadata fields. Further complicating the process is the possible presence or absence of the Guidewire Document Assistant control; if it is present, there is a set of information about the user's machine (location of temp files, etc) which also needs to be tracked.

    The DocumentCreationInfo class gathers all of these details into a single object. It should not be used outside of the document creation UI.
    DocumentCreationInfo.ContextObjectValueMap  
    DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo  
    DocumentCreationInfo.GlobalContextProducer  
    DocumentDetailsInfo
    Encapsulates information about a Document entity whose details are being displayed on the document details UI page.

    This wrapper entity is required because the user may upload new document contents from the document details page, and those document contents need to be stored on the server side until the user commits all of his or her changes and the new content can be uploaded to the document management system.
    DocumentExistsException  
    DocumentsUtilBase
    Helper methods for the Document-related UI pages.
    LocationSymbolProvider  
    LocationSymbolProvider.VariableElementSymbol  
    Symbol
    A symbol used for document generation
    SymbolProvider
    Provids execution context for the document generation
    TemplatePluginUtils

    TemplatePluginUtils.TemplateSetupBlock
